feedbackDialog.title: Give Feedback
feedbackDialog.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts on how we can improve.

logoutDialog.title: Are you sure you want to logout?
logoutDialog.description: You will be redirected to the login page.

loginPage.title: Welcome to FIn-Box
loginPage.description: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
loginPage.signUpDescription: Enter your details to get started.

error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
error.emailInUse: This email is already registered. Please log in.
error.weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters long.

loginPage.welcome: Welcome! Redirecting you to the dashboard.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.defaultSuggestion: Start by adding some transactions to see your financial summary.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: View and manage your financial transactions.

clearDataDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
clearDataDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your transaction and budget data from the database.

importDialog.title: Import Transactions
importDialog.description: Upload a document to automatically extract transactions.
importDialog.dragDrop: Drag & drop a file or click to select
importDialog.fileTypes: Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, and CSV files.

budgetsDialog.title: Your Budgets
budgetsDialog.description: Track and manage your monthly spending.
budgetsDialog.noBudgetsDescription: Click "Add New Budget" to get started.

addBudgetDialog.title: Add New Budget
addBudgetDialog.description: Create a new budget to track your spending for a category.

addTransactionDialog.title: Add New Transaction
addTransactionDialog.description: Enter the details of your new transaction manually.

history.title: Transaction History
history.description: A list of your recent transactions.
history.loginPrompt: Please log in to view and manage your transactions.

toasts.errorLoginToAdd: You must be logged in to add a transaction.
toasts.errorLoginToImport: You must be logged in to import transactions.
toasts.errorReadingFile: Failed to read the uploaded file.
toasts.errorProcessingFile: An unexpected error occurred during file processing.
toasts.errorLoginToAddBudget: You must be logged in to add a budget.
toasts.successClearData: All transaction and budget data has been cleared.

brainstorm.title: Brainstorm
brainstorm.description: Explore investment ideas and build your business plan.
brainstorm.schemeSummary: This scheme provides financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, market entry, and commercialization. It helps bridge the gap between idea and venture.
brainstorm.ideasDescription: Explore our curated library of startup ideas or enter your own below to get AI-powered insights.

ideaCategoryDialog.description: Here are some business ideas in the {category} sector.

brainstorm.ideaPlaceholder: Describe your business idea, e.g., 'A cloud kitchen for healthy salads in metropolitan cities...'
brainstorm.errorEnterIdea: Please enter an idea to analyze.

myIdeas.title: My Saved Ideas
myIdeas.description: A collection of all your brilliant business ideas.
myIdeas.loginPrompt: Please log in to see your saved ideas.
myIdeas.noIdeas: You haven't saved any ideas yet.

investmentIdea.errorLoginToSave: You must be logged in to save an idea.
investmentIdea.ideaSavedSuccess: Your idea has been saved successfully.

generateDPR.title: Generate Detailed Project Report (DPR)
generateDPR.description: Brainstorm with our AI to build your comprehensive DPR for {projectName}.

form.title: Project Details
form.description: First, let's gather some basic details for your DPR.

chat.welcome: Hello! I am here to help you brainstorm and build a Detailed Project Report (DPR) for your project: **{projectName}**. To start, could you tell me a bit more about the business idea?
chat.error: I'm sorry, but I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.

launchpad.title: Launchpad
launchpad.description: Your guide to starting your entrepreneurial journey.

statePortals.title: State-Specific Portals
statePortals.description: Access resources and schemes from your state government.

apmsmeone.title: APMSME ONE
apmsmeone.description: A dedicated portal for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises in Andhra Pradesh, offering a range of services and support.

govtSchemes.title: Key Government Schemes
govtSchemes.description: Leverage these government initiatives to fuel your growth.

seedFund.title: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme
seedFund.summary: Provides financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, and market entry.

mudra.title: MUDRA Loans (PMMY)
mudra.summary: Offers loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro-enterprises. Ideal for initial funding needs.

cgtmse.title: Credit Guarantee Scheme (CGTMSE)
cgtmse.summary: Facilitates collateral-free credit for Micro and Small Enterprises from financial institutions.

aim.title: Atal Innovation Mission (AIM)
aim.summary: Promotes a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship through various initiatives, including incubation centers.

startupHubs.title: Major Startup Hubs
startupHubs.description: Discover the top ecosystems for entrepreneurs in India.

bengaluru.name: Bengaluru, Karnataka
bengaluru.description: India's Silicon Valley, known for its strong tech ecosystem, access to venture capital, and a large talent pool.

delhi.name: Delhi-NCR
delhi.description: A diverse startup hub with a large consumer market, strong B2B opportunities, and a mix of various industries.

mumbai.name: Mumbai, Maharashtra
mumbai.description: The financial capital of India, offering great access to funding, and a thriving fintech and media-tech scene.

hyderabad.name: Hyderabad, Telangana
hyderabad.description: A rapidly growing hub with strong government support, a focus on life sciences, and emerging technologies.

startupJourney.title: Your Startup Journey
startupJourney.description: A step-by-step guide to launching your business.

step1.title: 1. Idea & Validation
step1.description: Define your business idea and validate its market potential. Research your target audience and competitors.

step2.title: 2. Business Plan (DPR)
step2.description: Create a Detailed Project Report (DPR). Use our "Brainstorm" feature to get AI-powered assistance in building your plan.

step3.title: 3. Register Your Business
step3.description: Choose a business structure (Sole Proprietorship, LLP, Pvt. Ltd.) and complete the legal registration process. Check for state-specific portals like APMSME ONE.

step4.title: 4. Funding & Finance
step4.description: Explore funding options like bootstrapping, angel investors, venture capital, or government schemes.

step5.title: 5. Build & Launch
step5.description: Develop your Minimum Viable Product (MVP), set up your operations, and officially launch your business.

step6.title: 6. Market & Grow
step6.description: Implement your marketing strategy to attract customers and scale your operations for growth.

growthHub.title: Growth Hub
growthHub.description: Your guide to scaling and managing your enterprise in India.

aiAdvisor.title: AI Financial Advisor
aiAdvisor.description: Your personal guide to financial clarity. Ask me anything!
aiAdvisor.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI Financial Advisor. Ask me anything about personal finance, budgeting, or investing.
aiAdvisor.error: I'm sorry, but I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
